bibl.title: Photograph of Walter L. Reed and Paul H. Streit in front of Walter Reed General Hospital, Washington, D.C., September 10, 1951

div1.head: Photograph of Walter L. Reed and Paul H. Streit in front of Walter Reed General Hospital, Washington, D.C., September 10, 1951
div1.p: WALTER REED ARMY MEDICAL CENTER, Washington, D.C., September 10, 1951

Major General Walter Reed (ret.) former Army Inspector General and son of Major
Walter Reed for whom the Center and its hospital was named visits the Center and
its commanding General, Major General Paul H. Streit (left foreground), while
soldier-patients recently returned from action in Korea sun themselves on the
steps of the hospital's main building.
